name: THROBOT DEMO DD11 [VERSION 2.2 ADDED]
description:
VERSIONS 2.2

FIXED INFINITE WALL BOOST/CEILING HALFBOOSTS

ALSO INCLUDES THE D3D FILES, IF YOUR GAME CRASHED ON STARTUP IT WAS BECAUSE OF THAT I THINK?

VERSION 2

FIXED JUMPS THAT WERE TOO STRICT, SLIGHT MODIFICATIONS TO CAMERA AND CHARACTER CONTROL, AND NEW LEVEL SEGMENTS.

This demo features a small cave to explore, a short and simple opportunity to play around with the main mechanics.

Z for jump and suplex, X to dash, grab, and throw, arrow keys to move.

Press left or right on the main menu to zoom or shrink the window.

Music is not mine, the song is called HIGHPAD from the pxtone manual. Credit to the original creator.
